name: 孤胆惊魂3:起源 Fear3:Origins
description:
Game Backstory：


This is a world full of blood, viruses, cults and mysterious events ...... One year in the future, an epidemic breaks out all over the world and almost all humans and animals are infected by the virus, thus turning them into walking corpses. The principal of a school, goes to the Institute, the source of the virus emanation. In order to uncover the mastermind behind these bloody events and save their own hands to find a vaccine for the virus, however things are not that simple ......

Gameplay：

     
 This is a pixel style puzzle, survival, adventure, survival, horror shooting game, the game perspective using a top view angle, you will control Ling Feng (the protagonist) in the monster attacks continue to survive, and to find the truth. The game has a variety of monsters, different ways of attack, their own attributes are also different, players need to use the existing weapons in the hands of resources to respond flexibly, otherwise it will be very difficult to pass. There are different types of guns in the game, and each has its own characteristics, so please switch according to your needs. Weapons can be strengthened and can also be inlaid with a variety of different plug-ins, wish you crazy kill the enemy. There are also a variety of accessories and magic weapons to help you get through the difficult times. There are various professions for you to choose at the beginning of the game, and you can also use professional skills to help you not die in the dangerous environment during the battle. With the passage of the plot, you can unlock the multi-week game, will also unlock powerful equipment and convenient props.

Author's Message：


       This is my independent production of the game, so there are many defects in all aspects. For example, the music, art and other aspects are not perfect, and even some bugs will appear that you can not solve, I hope you bear more. If there are bugs, I will be the first to solve. This game is the third work of the Lone Survivor series, in all aspects than the previous work has a lot of progress.
